# Ironguard (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[7th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 7]], [[7th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 7]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 13th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 13]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F, M

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** Spell Compendium (WotC), pg. 125

*You watch as your targetâ€™s skin lightens and takes on a translucent look.*

This spell functions like *[[Ironguard, Lesser (Spell)|lesser ironguard]]**,* except that the subject you touch is immune to magic metal as well.

*Material Component:* A tiny shield of wood, glass, or crystal.

*Focus:* A small nugget of adamantine worth 100 gp.
